content.raw:
Yes, I've always run with it set. My script for starting qual1:

```
#!text

source /opt/nasa/indigo/setup.bash
roslaunch srcsim qual1.launch  init:="true"

```
Previously I was sending footstep messages successfully so clearly I had high-level control operating. My srcsim setup got screwed up just last night from system software updates so I can't test anything right now. Just before I did that update I tried to make Val walk but it didn't work. (Now I can't get Val to stand - see comment under "collapse" issue.)
content.html:
Yes, I've always run with it set. My script for starting qual1:

source /opt/nasa/indigo/setup.bash
roslaunch srcsim qual1.launch  init:="true"

Previously I was sending footstep messages successfully so clearly I had high-level control operating. My srcsim setup got screwed up just last night from system software updates so I can't test anything right now. Just before I did that update I tried to make Val walk but it didn't work. (Now I can't get Val to stand - see comment under "collapse" issue.)
